text: The Thrive with Real Foods Challenge will start soon.
Welcome to the Thrive with Real Foods Challenge.
Today, focus on one thing that’s truly important to you.
What’s your motivation for staying the course?
Team Activity: Share what new healthy items are you thinking about trying this week?
New Team Activity: Share your top five priorities in life?
Develop a go-to dining out plan and some useful strategies that will help you stay on track.

Team Activity: What new healthy food items did you try this past week?

Make a habit of daily physical activity non-negotiable.
Team Activity: What does your healthy plate look like?
What does your food journal say about your eating behaviors and habits?
Diet doctors and nutritionists (the experts) routinely underestimate their daily caloric intake.
Recognize and observe your natural responses to change.
Learn how to challenge negative self-talk.
How do you usually view and experience change?
Willpower isn’t always available when you need it; how resilient you are when the going gets tough matters the most?
Team Activity: Share with the team any small action(s) that has(have) led to an improvement in your nutritional strategies.
Consistency in your behaviors is the name of the game.
Some progress is ALWAYS better than no progress.
Interested in trying a new habit that will inspire and motivate?
How strong is your support network?
Everyone needs a self-care plan. How's yours shaping up?

Is your environment causing you stress?
